subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: In his zeal to become the voice of Nascar, the Twitter-happy, cocksure Brad Keselowski has instead come off at times as its resident mouth.
snippet: In his zeal to become the voice of Nascar, the Twitter-happy, cocksure Brad Keselowski has instead come off at times as its resident mouth.
